title: Rififi a Tokyo = Rififi in Tokyo
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Auguste Le Breton.
description: Following the success of Jules Dassin's 'Rififi', producers decided to exploit the franchise. A number of caper dramas involving a complex robbery were produced in a variety of locations, including Japan. In this particular installment a gang of thieves is planning on taking hold of a single diamond stored in the vaults of a Japanese bank.  Credits: Producer, Jacques Bar ; director, Jacques Deray ; writers, Auguste Le Breton, Jose Giovanni, R. M. Arlaud ; photography, Tadashi Arakami ; music, Georges Delerue. Cast: Keiko Kishi, Barbara Lass, Karl-Heinz Boehm, Charles Vanel, Hideaki Suzuki, Michel Vitold.
